channel.title: Can someone help me ? [PI]
channel.description: ive added this in the quest tab : ( client.java ) [code] if (magic-book == 0) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[normal]", 29181); else if (magic-book == 1) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[ancient]", 29181); else if (magic-book == 2) getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[lunar]", 29181); [/code] but im getting this error : [code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:1705: error: cannot find symbol if (magic-book == 0) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1705: error: cannot find symbol if (magic-book == 0) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1707: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 1) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1707: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 1) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1709: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 2) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1709: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 2) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]

item.title: Can someone help me ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

ive added this in the quest tab : ( client.java )

			if (magic-book == 0) 
			getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[normal]", 29181);
			else if (magic-book == 1)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[ancient]", 29181);
			else if (magic-book == 2)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@red@swap magic book @red[lunar]", 29181);

but im getting this error :

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1705: error: cannot find symbol if (magic-book == 0) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1705: error: cannot find symbol if (magic-book == 0) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1707: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 1) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1707: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 1) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1709: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 2) ^ symbol: variable magic location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1709: error: cannot find symbol else if (magic-book == 2) ^ symbol: variable book location: class Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
